00:00 Deadpool vs. X-Men: Ryan Reynolds is Planning a Joint Film!
After the overwhelming success of "Deadpool & Wolverine", expectations for the next "Deadpool" movie are naturally high. Insider sources from the renowned industry magazine The Hollywood Reporter are now reporting that Ryan Reynolds is apparently planning a joint film with the X-Men!
